ED_Title: Request for an advisory opinion from the International Court of Justice on the consequences of legal obligations of States under different sources of international law with respect to immunities of Heads of State and Government and other senior officials
ED_DecisionText: At its 107th plenary meeting, on 16 September 2019, the General Assembly decided to include the item entitled “Request for an advisory opinion from the International Court of Justice on the consequences of legal obligations of States under different sources of international law with respect to immunities of Heads of State and Government and other senior officials” in the draft agenda of its seventy-fourth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/73/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
